â€œBottom Line Up Front: 
 I would highly recommend this to anyone who is looking for a great sativa based hybrid.  This is a great late evening weekend / funtimes strain.  Onset is a quick and you will soon find yourself engaged, euphoric, and arroused.  potent high with lasting effects makes this great for small intimate get togethers or to smoke with your main squeeze.  Great for pain and depression.

â€œStrong spicy, citrusy, cheese scented bud. Earthy flavor when smoked, flavor not very strong. Tiny buds in the gram I have (a little smaller than miniature marshmallows). Good for small bowls.

Smoke isn't too harsh, although it does leave a alight tickle in the back of one's throat. The high doesn't hit right away; sort of creeps up on you like Space Jill does, and it does wrap around your melon the same way. 

...â€

â€œMan this is strong. Got this from Trulieve. 4-5 hits on an empty stomach and I was in another dimension.â€

â€œVery strong! My tolerance was hight the first time I tried this strain and it really had an effect on me. I was feeling pretty spaced out actually, maybe don't use too much of this if you have to drive. Great medicine!!!â€

â€œMy new fave strain. Worked quickly. It helped me focus for studying. Got rid of the headache I'd get from trying to wrap my head around certain concepts as well as gave me the creative insight to understand why things happened.â€
â€œThis strain got me going but let me relax.  Catch 22 I know right?  It was nice, smoked smooth might have been Organic for which I give it an A.â€
â€œAt first, I thought... wow, this is nice. Seconds later, my brain exploded, my television started moving around the wall and everything made sense.â€

â€œThis is a tasty strain I smoked before taking a long walk at the beach. Oddly enough, I couldn't stop thinking about math equations until it wore off. This could be in part to my obsession with multiple regression and structural equation modeling at present. Finishing a dissertation, so maybe that has something to do with it. But, nonetheless, it is a really contemplative strain and one that made thinking about mathe...â€

â€œGot ahold of this last night, told it was brought all the way from California. Tastes rather earthy on the exhale, the high quickly grows on you and its like your mind spins on two ends. Gets you really contemplative in a speedy sort of way, gives you a lot of new insights on anything ranging from a TV show to a philosophical conversation. Best smoked through a pipe for this one, the bubbler we got seemed to kill mos...â€

â€œThis strain is hands down the best I've had. I have enormous bouts of anxiety and this seems to be the only strain that shuts it down. And depending on my mood I'll get a different experience whether that means needing a drifting through a couch lock or putting on music, making dinner - those things that anxiety distracts me from - fun! Can't wait for the next batch to come through my area.â€

â€œAcquired medically from Planet Joe at the NW Cannabis Market. Space Bomb has an incredibly complex flavor and aroma, like few others. Sweet, and earthy notes of pine, sage, a sweet floral flavor I can't quite describe specifically. The many layered flavor is definitely to be savored. The effect comes on gently, but definite. Living up to its name and parentage, your head is lifted to a floaty, ebbing and flowing peac...â€
â€œit's very nice it gives you the best mode for party and having funâ€
â€œThanks Sub for this amazing strain. My favorite also!! So yummy!â€

â€œDeff smoke this how ever you want. Smell is sweet wood rot with a kind of pungent gas. Also the smells-taste, is like a fresh stack of money. Insane looking trichs! Smoke is pleasant, deff tap it before you get a cotton mouth ass hit.  The feeling is like having a tiny black hole in the middle of your brain. Not a fast acting, tasty, chronic smoking flower. Maybe better as crumble or in treats.â€
â€œman i hit this shit and i was SMACKED !! WHEEEEW ... hits nice in papers too ... yessir ...â€
â€œReally liked this... A heady buzz but a certain lightness to it but totally effective... Found myself on the verge of giggles... Nice bud!â€

â€œI really liked the taste of this strain when I tried it out at a local farmers market. It had a nice sweet taste that kinda reminded me of the Amsterdam sweetness but not the same which was a nice change of pace. The high was very energetic and definitely made me want to get moving.  I would recommend it for sativa enthusiasts and people that like good tasting bud 8/10.â€

â€œPungent, smells great, breaks down nicely, smokes good, nice high that doesnt leave you sleepy or stuck in the couch.â€

â€œVery nice! I definitely feel uplifted and happy, but v-e-r-y relaxed too, which is nice. I tend to be more Indica leaning, but I am liking Sativa hybrids, particularly this one! Definite sweet fruity smell, and LOTS of orange hairs.â€
â€œA wonderful psycho-active experience. The effects distracted me from pain. I wouldn't recommend for newbies, as it is very potent. Earth's Healing Earthgrow has outdone itself with this winner!â€

â€œSpace Bomb was recommended by the good people at The Center for Palliative Care in Seattle, WA as having a well rounded effect. They were not lying. From the first hit, which was very smooth, the sativa hit first and gave me a very euphoric feeling. Then the colors start getting more vivid as my mind spins, thinking all these new creative thoughts. After a couple more hits I can feel the indica start working, helping...â€
â€œmost excellent. nice spacey high. space bomb shatter is great to vapeâ€
â€œHigh quality strain. Extremely euphoric and it makes me want to go outside and do shit. The SB I've had seems to have purple in it as well! Very pretty buds.â€

â€œGreat sit down and watch a funny movie strain.â€
â€œThe name says it just like it is. Hold it in deep and let the concentrate do it work. Felt like I went to space for a bit while I wrote thisâ€
â€œsuper happy with this one. it's a one hit wonder no doubt. nice taste and you dont need a lot to get your day going. pricy, but worth it. ;)â€

â€œOne of my favorite strains, equal to the electrifying sativa Durban Poison for euphoric and energizing effects, but without any of the anxiety edge that can come along with DP.  For my money, Space Bob is infinitely superior to its legendary parent, Space Queen.  Even though it's only a 60% Sativa hybrid, the effects of Space Bomb feel primarily like Sativa.â€
â€œThis strain brought me from a very down" frame of mind to a relaxed
column4: enjoy-the-day mindset in minutes. Excellent euphoric and happy effects. Raw buds are nicely marbled with orange
column5: and the aroma is like fresh hay mixed with lemon verbena. Flavor is just a touch sweet

â€œSpaceBomb did its job as a sativa; woke me up, kept me focused... but it was very seedy, unfortunately I spent more time picking out the seeds than enjoying my high. The flavor is very earthy, the flavor to me did not match its scent.

It was on sale as a 20$ 8th and now I know why. I wouldn't waste your time with this strain unless its a decent price.â€
â€œI was NOT impressed with this strain. My Bud Tender told me it was like a middle road or equal between Sativia & Indica".

column1: I got NO relief of pain & minimal effect on anxiety or PTSD sxs. It may be so "equal" that it does nothing effectively. It was like I wasn't taking anything for my sxs at all.
I will not EVER buy this again & do NOT recommend it for any medicinal purposes.â€"
